sections.heading: Data Preparation
sections.content: Clean your data thoroughly. Remove duplicates, handle missing values, and normalize features. Quality data is the foundation of any successful ML project.

sections.heading: Model Selection
sections.content: Start with simple models like linear regression or decision trees. Use cross-validation to evaluate performance. Complex models like deep neural networks should only be used when simpler approaches fail.

sections.heading: Hyperparameter Tuning
sections.content: Use grid search or random search to find optimal hyperparameters. Avoid overfitting by using validation sets. Monitor metrics like precision, recall, and F1-score.
